room_title: Escape room "The Time Machine: Nemesis" by Dynamic Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Had an awesome time here for a team building event. Really have to work together. The clues and rooms are very well thought out! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "The Time Machine: Nemesis" by Dynamic Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: Our family has been to many escape rooms in the area and this was great. Very accommodating with time availability and easy to book it as private, which we prefer. Also great for adults and kids, we brought our 7 year old and she had fun too. Very fun!!

room_title: Escape room "The Time Machine: Nemesis" by Dynamic Escape Rooms in Phoenix
review: I brought a group of my employees to Dynamic to have a team building session and to check it all out. We absolutely had a blast! I will definitely be back and will do more group events in the future!You guys did a great job building the scene and making the escape a little harder than we thought weâ€™d experience.Thanks for having us!
